scripts.dev: concurrently "echo '[Press Ctrl + C] for EXIT ❌'" "echo '- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -'" "echo '🍵 Starting Live Server... 🍵'" "vite --port 3000" "echo '- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -'" "echo '🍵 Start COMPILING the SCSS... 🍵'" "sass --watch src/assets/sass/_index.scss:src/index.css"
scripts.build: echo 🚧 Start BUILDING by Vite... 🚧 && vite build
scripts.style:build: echo 📥 Start COMPRESSING the SCSS... 📥 && sass --style=compressed src/assets/sass/_index.scss:src/index.css
scripts.lint: echo 🎌 Checking Clean Code...🎌 && prettier --debug-check . && eslint --ext .js . && echo '----- Done!'
scripts.preview: echo 👀 Starting PREVIEW by Vite... 👀 && vite preview
scripts.fix: echo 🔧 Start FIXING Bad Code... 🔧 && prettier --write . && eslint --fix --ext .js .
